apis.name: Get Supplier Payables (Billing)
apis.description: Fetch supplier billing payables including invoices, paid amount, outstanding balance, GST, and due dates.

parameters.name: company_id
parameters.description: Company identifier

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User making the request

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Project ID to filter supplier payables

parameters.name: supplierType
parameters.description: Type of supplier like Contract work or Material

parameters.name: supplierdate
parameters.description: Filter suppliers by date

parameters.name: supplierId
parameters.description: Supplier ID, use -1 for all suppliers

apis.response_description: Returns supplier-wise invoices with paid amount, balance, GST, gross amount, due dates, and summary totals.

apis.name: Get Supplier Payables with GST (Billing)
apis.description: Fetch supplier billing payables with GST breakup, including invoices, taxable amount, GST details, paid amount, outstanding balance, and due dates.

parameters.name: company_id
parameters.description: Company identifier

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User making the request

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Project ID to filter supplier GST payables

parameters.name: supplierType
parameters.description: Type of supplier such as Contract work or Material

parameters.name: supplierdate
parameters.description: Optional date filter for supplier GST payables

parameters.name: gstDetails
parameters.description: GST detail level (0 = summary, 1 = invoice-wise GST breakup)

examples: List supplier invoices with GST details
apis.response_description: Returns supplier-wise invoices with taxable amount, GST breakup, paid GST, outstanding GST, gross totals, and aggregated GST summaries.

apis.name: Get Inventory Logs
apis.description: Retrieve inventory transaction logs for a project, including inward, outward, transfers, adjustments, and consumption records.

parameters.name: company_id
parameters.description: Company identifier

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User making the request

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Project ID to fetch inventory logs

examples: Get material inward and outward entries
apis.response_description: Returns chronological inventory logs with material name, transaction type, quantity, unit, reference details, user action, and timestamps.

apis.name: Get Monthly Material Ordered, Received & Billed
apis.description: Provides month-wise analytics of materials ordered, received, and billed for a project. Supports agency-wise, material-wise, or category-wise views.

parameters.name: company_id
parameters.description: Company identifier

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User making the request

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Project ID to fetch monthly material analytics

parameters.name: agancy_id
parameters.description: Agency ID filter, use 'all' for all agencies

parameters.name: material_id
parameters.description: Material ID filter, use 'all' for all materials

parameters.name: catgory_id
parameters.description: Material category ID filter, use 'all' for all categories

parameters.name: startYear
parameters.description: Start year and month in YYYY/MM format

parameters.name: endYear
parameters.description: End year and month in YYYY/MM format

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Aggregation type such as Agencywise, Materialwise, or Categorywise

examples: Show monthly material ordered vs received
apis.response_description: Returns month-wise ordered, received, and billed quantities and values grouped by selected aggregation type, along with totals.

apis.name: Get Value of Current Material Inventory
apis.description: Provides the current value of material inventory for a project, including quantities on hand, average rates, and total inventory valuation.

parameters.name: company_id
parameters.description: Company identifier

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User making the request

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Project ID to calculate current material inventory value

examples: Show value of current material inventory
apis.response_description: Returns material-wise quantities on hand, average rates, total value per material, and overall inventory value summary.

apis.name: Get Estimated vs Actuals
apis.description: Compares estimated quantities or costs against actual values for a project, helping track variances in material usage, billing, or execution.

parameters.name: company_id
parameters.description: Company identifier

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User making the request

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Project ID to compare estimated and actual values

examples: Compare planned and actual material usage
apis.response_description: Returns item-wise or category-wise estimated values, actual values, variance amounts, and variance percentages with overall summaries.

apis.name: Get Property Developer Cashflow

parameters.description: Company identifier

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User making the request

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Project ID to fetch cashflow data

parameters.name: startYear
parameters.description: Start year and month in YYYY/MM format

parameters.name: endYear
parameters.description: End year and month in YYYY/MM format

parameters.description: Company identifier

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User making the request

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID to fetch attendance summary

parameters.name: date

apis.name: Get Company Bootstrap Data
apis.description: Returns bootstrap data for a company including company details, projects, suppliers, and enabled modules. This API is typically called on app initialization to preload master data.

parameters.name: company_id
parameters.description: Company identifier for which bootstrap data is required

apis.response_description: Returns company profile information, list of active projects, suppliers with types, enabled modules, and API metadata used to initialize the application state.
